alert.note: Alert for Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 06 at 6:19AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central Kansas, including the following county, Washington. * WHEN...Until 1215 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 618 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Washington, Greenleaf, Morrowville, Haddam and Mahaska.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
